responses: What can I do for you?

patterns: how I take appointment for a doctor
I want to see the doctors list
How can I consult with a doctor
responses: Go to our "Services" section then go to "Book an Appointment with Doctor"

patterns: I want to check my health condition
I have some symptoms and I want to know what is happened with me
can I know my diseases from symptoms
responses: Go to our "Services" section then go to "Predict Disease"

patterns: from where I can buy Oxygen
responses: Go to our "Services" section then go to "Book Oxygen"

patterns: I want to book slot for vaccinations
want to know details and locations about vaccination centre
want to know the pricing about Vaccination
responses: Go to our "Services" section then go to "Get Vaccinated"

patterns: urgent need some medicine, what to do?
From where I can get medicine
responses: Go to our "Services" section then go to "Order Medicine"

patterns: from where I can borrow Ambulance
responses: Go to our "Services" section then go to "Call Ambulance"

patterns: I need to talk to management
responses: Open menu and go to "Contact" to contact us.
Open menu and go to "Contact" to contact us.
